name: Lunar
0:
”Alexa, turn on lunar.”
”Alexa, set lunar to low.”
”Alexa, turn on party mode on lunar.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Lunar is an elegant smart lamp that lights up your special occasions and brings fun to your party.
Talk to your Alexa to turn it on and off, adjust its brightness, change its color and switch it to Party Mode. 

To get started:
1) Register your lamp Lunar online at https://met-light.com/register.html 
2) Connect to Lunar's Wi-Fi and configure it to access Internet
3) Add Lunar to your Device List on your Alexa App or simply speak to your Alexa speaker to discover it
4) Enjoy control your Lunar by talking to Alexa
For detail instructions, please refer to the online guide at https://met-light.com
